roleset.name: change, modify
roleset.note: REVISE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'revise' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no Framenet entry. Comparison with modify. (from revise.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: boring transitive
example.text: The spokesman said that the proposed guidelines caused Crossland to revise its business objectives...

example.name: all args
example.text: ''Mr. Milunovich said he was revising his estimate for DEC's current year from $8.20 a share to ``well below $8,'' although he hasn't settled on a final number.
example.arg: his estimate for DEC 's current year
although he hasn't settled on a final number

example.name: Arg0, 1
example.text: Her revsion of the text is based on a newly discovered manuscript.
